allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$client = New-Object System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient\(''127.0.0.1'', 9999\); $stream = $client.GetStream\(\); $writer = New-Object System.IO.StreamWriter\($stream\); $reader = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader\($stream\); $writer.WriteLine\(''{""action"":""ping""}''\); $writer.Flush\(\); Start-Sleep -Milliseconds 500; $response = $reader.ReadLine\(\); Write-Output $response; $client.Close\(\)")
